title: Fire Emblem if: Nibelung no Hokan
original_name: ファイアーエムブレム if ニーベルングの宝冠
sinopse: A manga adaptation of Fire Emblem if that depicts the story of Leo, the second royal prince of Nohr. It is a side-story to the game and it follows the path of Birthright. The Avatar is depicted in its female incarnation.
